thread.title: Penguins hoping more depth behind stars leads to deeper run
thread.title_full: Penguins hoping more depth behind stars leads to deeper run

title: Penguins hoping more depth behind stars leads to deeper run
text: > Pennsylvania Penguins hoping more depth behind stars leads to deeper run FILE - In this Sept. 22, 2015, file photo, Pittsburgh Penguins' Sidney Crosby (87) and Phil Kessel (81) sit on the bench during the first period of an exhibition NHL hockey game against Carolina Hurricanes in Pittsburgh. The brooding and high-scoring forward, Kessel, earned a much-needed change of scenery after six seasons in Toronto, where he became the target of criticism for the Maple Leafs missing the playoffs five times. (AP Photo/Gene Puskar, File)
